title: Trojan Detection Container (trojai-example) - The template detector to be used within the TrojAI competition.
technique_description: Extracts model weights and trains a random forest regressor.
technique_changes: Mixup mobilnet data and fit the model; output metaparameter.json file after reconfiguration

automatic_training.description: Sets up automatic training to explore the training parameter space (should not do exhaustive search, but some optimized parameter search algorithm)

infer_normalize_features.description: Whether to normalize features or not

train_weight_table_random_state.description: Random state for weight table during training

train_weight_table_params_mean.description: Weight table parameter for the mean controlling. ...

train_weight_table_params_std.description: Weight table parameter for the standard deviation controlling. ...

train_weight_table_params_scaler.description: Weight table parameter for scaling controlling. ...

train_random_forest_regressor_param_n_es.description: Random forest regressor parameter n_estimators, controlling ...

train_random_forest_regressor_param_max_.description: Random forest regressor parameter max depth, controlling ...

train_random_forest_regressor_param_min_.description: Random forest regressor parameter min samples, controlling ...

train_random_forest_regressor_param_max_.description: Random forest regressor parameter maximum features, controlling ...
